property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each Angel Command and Armored Dragon in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SAMURAI GENERATION} (When you put this creature, you may generate a cross gear from your hand for no cost.) ■ Your other creatures in the battle zone that cost 4 or more get +2000 power and become Armored Dragon, Earth Dragon and Samurai in addition to their current race(s). {DOUBLE BREAKER}
